name: Guv'nor plus GV-2
details:
An update of the acclaimed Guvnor pedal of the 80â€™s. The GV-2 is renowned for its heavy, distorted tones with the flexibility to move from transparent overdrives to heavily saturated lead tones and further into huge, distorted JCM grunt. The GV-2 is an essential for all guitarists who like it loud.
